T02D1988:184b-1: badzra ts'a rtsi k'a karma s'a dha n'am /
T02D1988:184b-3: rdo rje ts'a rtsi k'a'i las sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D1988:184b-4: bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1988:184b-5: brtul zhugs dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos /
T02D1988:184b-6: dur khrod du phyin la dben par bya ste /
T02D1988:184b-7: zhag bdun du bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1988:184b-8: mdun du mandala mda' gang gi tshad kyi gru bzhi pa //
T02D1988:185a-0: dbus su sor nyi shu ba'i @185a * //
T02D1988:185a-2: steng du kha khyer brtsig par bya'o //
T02D1988:185a-3: de la dur khrod kyi sol bas byug / de'i grva lha sbyin gyi phyogs su bstan /
T02D1988:185a-4: lcags las byas pa'i rdo rje rtse gcig pa sor bcu gnyis pa mdun du dgod /
T02D1988:185a-5: 'bras phye dang lha sbyin gyi rdzas la brtag pa byas la /
T02D1988:185a-6: aa rga'i lo ma la rigs dang ming bris la /
T02D1988:185a-8: bhi ku'i srad bus btags te mgo bor bcing /
T02D1988:185a-9: de'i steng du man ji'i steng du /
T02D1988:185a-13: de ltar gtor ma rgyun du btang ngo //
T02D1988:185a-14: de nas bdag nyid gshin rje'i gshed dmar po rnal 'byor dang ldan pas /
T02D1988:185a-16: dpal lha mo tsandi ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02D1988:185a-17: sku mdog dmar nag / g-yas gri gug / g-yon thod pa khrag gis bkang ba bsnams pa /
T02D1988:185a-18: bdag gi bka' lung nyan par bsgoms la /
T02D1988:185a-19: dam tshig gi rdzas phul bas mnyes par bya'o ;
T02D1988:185a-23: ka pa tri yan tri pa na tri /
T02D1988:185a-33: p'u tsa au aa kha mundi /
T02D1988:185a-37: mi li tsu pa tsa ro //
T02D1988:185a-41: aa mu kam / m'a ra ya phat /
T02D1988:185a-50: skabs su drag po'i rdzas kyi sbyin sreg gis lha sbyin la brdeg par bya'o //
T02D1988:185a-51: dkyil 'khor du srog chags mun to ka la dar sgra sgrogs pa dang /
T02D1988:185a-52: rakta sa mu dra byung ba dang /
T02D1988:185a-53: rdo rje rtse gcig pas lha sbyin la brdung ba dang gdab par bya'o //
T02D1988:185a-55: ming la sogs pa thab khung du sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1988:185a-56: gtor ma yang lha sbyin gyi phyogs su dor ro //
T02D1988:185a-57: des ma grub na lan gnyis gsum du bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1988:185a-58: des kyang las mi byed na /
T02D1988:185a-59: dpal rdo rje tsa ndi ka sngon gyi thugs dam dran du gzhug pa'i man ngag bya ste /
T02D1988:185a-61: mna' bskyal ba'i dam tshig dran pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1988:185a-62: de ltar byas na sgrub pa po'i bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1988:185b-0: rdo rje tsandi ka'i las sgrub pa'i thabs @185b slob
T02D1988:185b-1: dpon chen po bram ze dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa
T02D1988:185b-3: / rgya gar gyi pandi ta rgyal sras bi bh'u ti tsandi'i zhal snga nas /
T02D1988:185b-4: glo bo lo ts'a ba dge slong shes rab rin
T02D1988:185b-5: chen gyis chos kyi rgyal po'i pho brang sku mkhar
